item.title: Lalande map
item.description: Kim has finished composing an extremely detailed map of the Lalande crater. It is a huge file, but available at request.

item.title: 3D models
item.description: We now have 3D content available. Blend4web and Sketchfab models are now viewable in your browser.

item.title: News feed for Moonwards
item.description: For all of you out there wanting to keep up with Moonwards, we are now going to post brief news to this handwritten RSS feed. Also consider our blog feed
